```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(here)

candy <- read_csv(here("clean_data/clean_candy.csv"))
```
```{r}
# Quesiton 1

candy %>% 
  summarise(number_of_ratings = sum(!is.na(rating)))
  
```
```{r}
#Question 2

candy %>% 
  select(going_out, age) %>% 
  group_by(going_out) %>% 
  summarise(average_age = median(age, na.rm = TRUE))  


```

```{r} 
# Question 3

candy %>% 
  filter(rating == "JOY") %>% 
  group_by(candy_type, rating) %>% 
  summarise(number_ratings = n()) %>% 
  ungroup() %>% 
  slice_max(number_ratings, n = 1)

candy %>% 
  filter(rating == "DESPAIR") %>% 
  group_by(candy_type, rating) %>% 
  summarise(number_ratings = n()) %>% 
  ungroup() %>% 
  slice_max(number_ratings, n = 1)

candy %>% 
  filter(rating == "MEH") %>% 
  group_by(candy_type, rating) %>% 
  summarise(number_ratings = n()) %>% 
  ungroup() %>% 
  slice_max(number_ratings, n = 1)

  
```
```{r}
# Quesiton 4

candy %>% 
  filter(rating == "DESPAIR") %>% 
  filter(candy_type == "starburst") %>% 
  summarise(number_of_ratings = n())
```
